ch0116_41_hikari/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s start this new day with a fresh, clean slate!
ch0116_41_hikari/7101_0701_02_10:
I might not know what’ll happen, but it makes
me feel like I’m dreaming of a bright future...
ch0116_41_hikari/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m going to keep taking each new step
without worrying about making mistakes!
ch0116_41_hikari/7102_0701_01_10:
Sensu Style Oricorio likes to show everyone its
elegant dancing.
ch0116_41_hikari/7102_0701_02_10:
I hope one day I can dance elegantly, too...
But it’s harder than it looks.
ch0116_41_hikari/7102_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’m studying Oricorio’s dances
right now!
ch0116_41_hikari/7103_0701_01_10:
This outfit is based on traditional clothes from
Johto... I hope I look OK in it.
ch0116_41_hikari/7103_0701_02_10:
I want to wear it nicely and put on a really
flashy performance!
ch0116_41_hikari/7104_0701_01_10:
Oricorio changes its form based on what kind of
flower nectar it sips.
ch0116_41_hikari/7104_0701_02_10:
Apparently, it doesn’t just change in appearance.
Its overall vibe and how it battles can also change
a lot!
ch0116_41_hikari/7104_0701_03_10:
That makes me want to become the kind of Trainer
who can adapt to different situations, too.
ch0116_41_hikari/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have any new goals or resolutions,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0116_41_hikari/7105_0701_02_10:
If you do, maybe we can share our goals with
each other! What do you think?
ch0116_41_hikari/1701_0701_01_10: This is bound to be lucky for you!
ch0116_41_hikari/1701_0702_01_10:
Presents have the power to make you
feel special!
ch0116_41_hikari/2501_0701_01_10:
My mom sometimes participates in contests in the
Sinnoh region.
ch0116_41_hikari/2501_0701_02_10:
Her partner is Jumpy the Kangaskhan. They’re
really high level and super good at the appeal
section of the contest!
ch0116_41_hikari/2501_0701_03_10:
They’re really tough to beat, but I’m not gonna
lose! I’ll practice for contests here on Pasio, then
challenge Mom and Jumpy!
ch0116_41_hikari/2501_0702_01_10:
Do you know that feeling of not wanting to lose
to a family member?
ch0116_41_hikari/2501_0702_02_10:
Even if you love them a lot, you still wanna win,
right? I’m sure you know what I’m talking about.
ch0116_41_hikari/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that there are some dreams that bring
you good luck if you see them at the start of a
new year!
ch0116_41_hikari/2511_0701_02_10:
If I’m going to be dreaming anyway, I hope
the dreams are fun...
ch0116_41_hikari/2511_0702_01_10:
If I dream of having fun battling with all of my
friends and Pokémon...
ch0116_41_hikari/2511_0702_02_10: I bet wonderful things will happen this year!
ch0116_41_hikari/3001_0701_01_10:
Did you see the sunrise this morning?! I swear it
was shining and sparkling more than ever!
ch0116_41_hikari/3003_0701_01_10:
Just going out in a bright and cheery outfit really
lifts my mood! How about you?
ch0116_41_hikari/3005_0701_01_10:
Well, the sun’s gone down and the day’s about to
end...but there’s still so much I want to do!
